adrFormatAddress: 201 W 21st St #15D, New York, NY 10011, USA

originalText.text: Shelly is the best. She really changed my life. I had over 20 laser sessions in my face and was not working but Shelly cleaned my face. My face's hair is thinner and it would be gone in the next sessions. Her prices are very affordable and her schedule is very flexible. She is very sweet, friendly and try to make the process easier. It is very nice to see her every week. She also speaks Spanish.

text.text: Shelly is the best. She really changed my life. I had over 20 laser sessions in my face and was not working but Shelly cleaned my face. originalText.text: My first time visiting Shelly was about six years ago and I would have to say it’s the best decision I ever made .I’m Glad I took the time to get my electrolysis. I sure wasn’t ready to invest in a lifetime of razors.  Super happy with my skin , face and confidence! Truly made a major difference in my life for me. I used to have to remove my hair every day and after a couple of sessions I was ready to stop hair removal completely and just stay with electrolysis weekly.

originalText.text: Shelly is an efficient and caring technician. Her rates are competitive and she works fast. A very organized scheduling and a warm environment. Highly recommend. Multilingual.

text.text: Shelly is an efficient and caring technician. Her rates are competitive and she works fast. A very organized scheduling and a warm environment. Highly recommend. Multilingual.

originalText.text: Shelly is really quite wonderful. I needed electrolysis in a very sensitive area and she was the only person who was willing to take it on. Shelly always makes me feel comfortable and relaxed. She also know her stuff and explains clearly what is happening, before during and follow up care necessary. She's fast and affordable. I've seen her twice now and look forward to the next session.

originalText.text: I’ve been coming here for over year, and I highly recommend. Shelley is thorough with what to expect, how long it will take, and after care to avoid infection. Also, she is very kind and we have great conversations every appointment.
